message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV

This paper discusses a method for combining imitation learning and reinforcement learning to improve policy learning. The paper focuses on the algorithmic aspects of the approach and formulates several popular RL and IL algorithms in a common mirror descent framework. This suggests that the paper is likely to be categorized under machine learning (cs.LG) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also evaluates the performance of the proposed method in several simulated environments, which suggests that it may also be categorized under robotics (cs.RO) or control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper mentions using the proposed method in computer vision applications, which suggests that it may also be categorized under computer vision (cs.CV).
